| HistoryText             = [[Don of the Dead (Earth-616)|Don of the Dead]]'s Cartel was based in the state of Michoacan in western central [[Mexico]]. The cartel was involved in the drug trade, specifically the manufacturing and smuggling of methamphetamine. When the [[Anthony Masters (Earth-616)|Taskmaster]] visited Don of the Dead, there were rows of Recreational Vehicles in which there were meth labs.{{r|Taskmaster Vol 2 2}} 

The cartel's power was such that whenever there were disputes in Michoacan, it was to the cartel that they turned to not the police.{{r|Taskmaster Vol 2 2}} Members of the cartel all wore masks with costumes, either skull masks with dark clothing or lucha libre masks with wrestling pants and gloves.{{r|Taskmaster Vol 2 2}}{{r|Deadpool vs. The Punisher Vol 1 2}}{{r|Power Man and Iron Fist Vol 2 1}} The cartel's drugs were distributed as far north as [[New York City]], and its reach extended just as far.{{r|Deadpool vs. The Punisher Vol 1 2}}{{r|Power Man and Iron Fist Vol 2 1}}
